title: Red Moon
description: Private investigator Samantha Chase survived an immortal serial killer, but now she faces a new danger. The city is paralyzed by fear as bizarre animal attacks plague the streets. When Sam's new case involving a missing college student becomes entangled with these attacks, she suspects a sinister scheme at play. However, Sam's troubles don't end there. Her relationship with Adam, a mysterious and protective vampire, is tested when he vanishes just when she needs him the most. As she searches for him, Sam realizes her life may be in danger. To survive the growing threats against her, she must find the missing student. Amidst assassination attempts, veiled threats from her clients, and a mysterious stalker, Sam remains determined to locate Adam. She must rely on her psychic abilities, even if they point to Adam as her greatest threat. Can she halt a supernatural turf war, find the missing girl, and stay alive long enough to rescue Adam?
author: R.K. Close
